channel.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
channel.description: [b]Okay guys! i need help with my server, i cant get it 2 run.. i ha it going good b4 btu then i edited my enviorment labels 2 try and get my compiler 2 work. i tried deleting them and then i tried 2 edit them so it would work and nothing has accualy WORKED so far, so obviously i need some help by som1 smarter than me.. and all of my idiotic friends.. soo, CMAWWNN i need help here :) the black box that pops up called the command prompt or watever comes up and goes emidiatly back down.. as in it gets exited, and i didnt click the big black X either, sooo surprising.. and i know that alot of ppl have this problem because my friend had it.. my cousin.. and 2 other of my friends that hae tried 2 make servers, and i am the only one 2 get it 2 work.. 4 2 days -.- okay soo, ill take suggestions :)[/b]

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it

just wait if it still runs?

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

no, not what i ment :S i cant even run my server… the black box that is supposed 2 come up and say ladiat da is online dont stay up…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2008, 06:09:13 AM[/size][hr]ive tried all of ur above ideas and noneof them have worked… im pretty sure it has somthing 2do with my enviorment labels

Read full topic
item.source: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Probably because the version of jdk that your compiler is looking for isn’t the one you have.

Just use this:

@echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help? when i click on runserver.bat i get a black box and then it exits it
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

Try not posting in Red,

And after that,

put

@pause

at the end of your .bat file…
